content.raw: Is this function meant simply for debugging purposes, or is the developer supposed to parse relevant information from it? If it's the latter case, then we probably need to agree upon the format/contents of the return string with @emotodorov before our implementations start to diverge. Alternatively, if we allow for different environments to implement this in whatever way we desire, we should note that in this documentation.
